name: SILVER PENDANT RHODIUM PLATED
description: Made in Pure 92.5 % Real Sterling Silver. 925 hallmark stamp will be on every product. Finest Quality Swiss Zirconia - As brilliant As Diamond. Sparkle of our specially cut zirconia is very much equivalent to Real Diamond and even professionals can not differentiate with naked eyes whether it is Zirconia or Diamond.
